attributes.action: No pay rise for MP's (see details)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As MP's (members of parliament) are public servants, the public should choose the rate of pay rise they receive.

This year, all the MP's anual pay rise should be donated to good causes (to be confirmed by impartial group).  If the MP receives a 2% rise (more likely to be 5%), then the amount of money that constitutes the 2% (e.g £750) should go into a fund for good causes, lets get our MP's supporting good causes, and show that they are here for the good of the country, not personal gain.

(all figures are estimated)
